name: Courier
description: Anime, Manga, and Light Novel Tracker Desktop Application for Windows. A fast and interactive way for AniList users to track and manage their anime/manga lists.

name: txt note manager
description: A windows desktop application that helps you manage your notes and txt files.

name: probable file system
description: A python script to copy the largest file(s) from a folder with optional sub-folders into a destination folder. An easy way to copy osu! songs to another folder.

name: ReStartQ Portfolio (ReStartQ.github.io)
description: The vue + bootstrap project used to generate this portfolio website
